Module com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu
Package com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu.client

Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
com.ifce.ppd.tsoroyematatu.client.ServerConnection
public class ServerConnection extends Object
Start the client, connects to a server with a hostname/ipAdress and port. Once the connection is made, creates and starts two threads: SendThread and ReceiveThread.

  • Method Details

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()

    • startConnection

      public void startConnection(String host)
      Start the connection with the server (port 12345) and start ReceiveThread and SendThread. If the connection cannot be done, set isConnected to false.
      Parameters:
      host - The hostname ex.: localhost | 127.0.0.1

    • createClientOnServer

      public void createClientOnServer(String roomId) throws NullClientException
      Send init flag.
      Throws:
      NullClientException - Lançada quando não há cliente.

      Use the sendThread to send message to server.
      Parameters:

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(String author, String message)
      Used by the ReceiveThread to get the message from the server and send it to the chat.
      Parameters:
      author - The message's author.
      message - The content of the message.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(String pieceId, String pointId)
      Use the sendThread to send the move to the server.
      Parameters:
      pieceId - The pieceId
      pointId - The pointId

    • receiveMove

      public void receiveMove(String pieceId, String pointId)
      Use the receiveThread to get the move valitation, and pass it to the current controller.
      Parameters:
      pieceId - The piece's id
      pointId - The point's id
